• Building a Mod
• Launching a Mod
To launch the mod in Kane's Wrath you have to use the WrathEd Mod Launcher.



You can download the the tool either on Thundermods.net or on ModDB.

The parameters used to run the Mod Launcher will be passed to the game. For example, if you run 
"WrathEd Mod Launcher.exe" -win
then the game will start in windowed mode when you launch a mod.

• Shortcut:
To create a shortcut for launching a mod directly right click on the "WrathEd Mod Launcher.exe" and then click on "Create shortcut". Best to name it something like "Run SampleMod". Then right click on it and click Properties. In the new window add something like the following example: 
 -runmod "SampleMod" "1.00"
(after the path, outside of the quotation marks)

If you don't want to run a mod but just the game (e.g. for using compiled maps) then just add: 
 -nomod
